column1: #text=Borrowing a book from the library is a big responsibility .
#text=I got my first library card when I was in middle school .
#text=I could go right down the street from my house and explore everything the library had to offer .
#text=My library has books , magazines , computers , movies , anything I need .
#text=I was searching for a book around Halloween that had some fun ghost stories .
#text=My library had the exact book I wanted !
#text=I sat around a table with my pile of books and looked through them .
#text=Finally , I could n't resist and I went to the counter with the book I had come there for .
#text=The librarian was really nice as she took my card and typed into her computer .
#text=I checked the book out for two weeks .
#text=This would give me plenty of time to enjoy it and best of all , the librarian let me know I could check it out for even longer if I needed to .
#text=I would just have to bring the book back on the due date and have it scanned out again .
#text=I took great care of my book and returned it on time .
#text=Libraries provide a great service to me and my community and I 'm thankful I can go there and always find what I want to read .
